TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToneGenerator extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides methods to play DTMF tones (ITU-T Recommendation Q.23), call supervisory tones (3GPP TS 22.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This method starts the playback of a tone of the specified type. only one tone can play at a time: if a tone is playing while this method is called, this tone is stopped and replaced by the one requested.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool StartTone (Android.Media.Tone toneType, int durationMs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool StartTone(valuetype Android.Media.Tone toneType, int32 durationMs) cil managed
abstract member StartTone : Android.Media.Tone * int -> bool override this.StartTone : Android.Media.Tone * int -> bool

Docs.param: The tone duration in milliseconds. If the tone is limited in time by definition, the actual duration will be the minimum of durationMs and the defined tone duration. Setting durationMs to -1, is equivalent to calling .
Docs.summary: This method starts the playback of a tone of the specified type for the specified duration.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This method stops the tone currently playing playback.
